properties.value: In Trailblazer League, all Slayer masters assign tasks from the same list. They award the same amount of points (15 points except for bonus tasks), have the same monster weights, and all require level 5 combat to begin receiving tasks. The slayer masters still respect combat level requirements for assigning harder tasks. Krystillia cannot assign tasks during the league, but any Slayer targets defeated within the Wilderness will have a chance to drop a Larran's key.

Overview[edit | edit source]

In Trailblazer League, all Slayer masters assign tasks from the same list. They award the same amount of points (15 points except for bonus tasks), have the same monster weights, and all require level 5 combat to begin receiving tasks. The slayer masters still respect combat level requirements for assigning harder tasks. Krystillia cannot assign tasks during the league, but any Slayer targets defeated within the Wilderness will have a chance to drop a Larran's key.

Check the Trailblazer guide for melee, Magic, and Ranged for tips on efficiently training combat during the league.

Unlocking an area will add six new slayer monsters to the master task list. Since everyone begins the league with Misthalin✓ and Karamja✓ unlocked, the starting task list will consist of:

  • Cows (while under level 50 combat)
  • Goblins (while under level 50 combat)
  • Minotaurs (while under level 50 combat)
  • Zombies (while under level 50 combat)
  • Abyssal demons
  • Ankou
  • Fossil Island wyverns
  • Hill Giants
  • Moss giants
  • Spiders
  • Sourhogs (after completing A Porcine of Interest)
  • Fire Giants
  • Greater Demons
  • Harpie bug swarms
  • Iron dragons
  • Steel dragons
  • Tzhaar

Farming fast slayer points[edit | edit source]

If you are looking to get slayer points fast for unlocks and upgrades one of the fastest ways is Hill Giant and Moss Giant farming. This is made incredibly easy with Last Recall and Unnatural Selection.

Go to any slayer master and select either Giant as a task and then teleport to Varrock. Enter Edgeville Dungeon (made easy with a Brass key). Kill Giants for your task, then use the Crystal of memories to teleport back to the slayer master. This technique gives 200+ slayer points per hour in addition to access to the giant bosses Obor and Bryophyta who with their drops give 150 league points each.

Alternatively, a spider task can be completed on the low level spiders commonly used for splashing. These can be found in the varrock sewers and near the H.A.M. hideout, as well as in the clock tower basement, for those who have unlocked Kandarin. Large numbers of aggressive spiders are also located in the 3rd level of the Stronghold of Security.

Each area unlocked will add six slayer monsters to the master task list for every Slayer master. In the table below, a region that unlocks a specific slayer monster is marked with 'Auto', and all other regions where the monster can be killed are listed with their respective icons.

Superior slayer monsters[edit | edit source]

Superior slayer monsters may only be encountered after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master, and only while on a Slayer task. Due to regions restricting Slayer task lists, there are a limited number of superior encounters possible per region. If a player chooses to unlock Asgarnia, Kandarin, and the Wilderness, then they will not be able to take advantage of the Bigger and Badder unlock until level 85 Slayer.

These are the only way to obtain the imbued heart or the eternal slayer gem.

Region Count Min. Slayer level Creatures
Misthalin✓
Karamja✓		 1 85 Greater abyssal demon (85)
Asgarnia✓ 0 N/A N/A
Fremennik✓ 5 25 Cockathrice (25), Monstrous basilisk (40), Vitreous Jelly (52), Spiked Turoth (55), Basilisk Sentinel (60), King kurask (70)
Kandarin✓ 1 93 Nuclear smoke devil (93)
Desert✓ 2 30 Flaming pyrelord (30), Choke devil (65)
Morytania✓ 5 15 Screaming banshee (15), Insatiable Bloodveld (50), Cave abomination (58), Marble gargoyle (75), Nechryarch (80)
Tirannwn✓ 4 50 Insatiable Bloodveld (50), King kurask (70), Nechryarch (80), Night beast (90)
Wilderness✓ 0 N/A N/A

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (yellow spice) Desert✓ Boosts Slayer by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Wild pie Misthalin✓ Boosts Slayer by 5. Requires level 50 Hunter to obtain from eclectic implngs. Otherwise requires level 85 Cooking and raw chompy.
Slayer's respite Misthalin✓ Boosts Slayer by 2. Requires level 50 Hunter to obtain from eclectic implngs. Only otherwise available with level 59 Cooking from brewing.
Slayer's respite(m) Morytania✓ Fremennik✓ Boosts Slayer by 4. Requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 59 Cooking, more easily produced by using the stuff from Trouble Brewing.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Slayer Cape Karamja✓ Duradel While equipped or in inventory, there is a 10% chance of having a previous slayer task reassigned when obtaining a new slayer task.
